short_summary: DND has an Intermediate statistics requirement
description: DND wants one Intermediate statistics specialist for analyzing and reporting on Defence Team Well-Being Survey
full_summary:
# Statistics Specialist Tender Announcement
## Title & Closing Information
This is an expired tender announcement for a project requiring an Intermediate Statistics Specialist.

* Announcement Title: Statistics Specialist, Intermediate level
* Solicitation Number: W2282-24-AA016
* Tender Closing Date: June 19, 2024, 2:00 PM ET

## Project Brief
The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking a qualified Intermediate Statistics Specialist to support the Director Research Personnel Generation (DRPG) in analyzing and reporting on the Defence Team Well-Being Survey. The successful candidate will be responsible for providing expert statistical analysis and reporting services.

## Key Requirements
* Intermediate level of expertise in statistics
* Ability to work independently and as part of a team
* Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
* Excellent communication and reporting skills

## Eligibility and Procurement Information
* The tender is open to all qualified contractors
* The procurement method is Competitive - Traditional
* The selected contractor will be awarded a contract based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price
* The contract will be governed by the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and other applicable trade agreements

## Contracting Entity Information
* Contracting Entity: Department of National Defence
* Address: 60 Moodie Drive, Ottawa, Ontario K2H 8G1, Canada

## Contact Information
* Contact Name: Olga Zelenskaia
* Contact Email: CMPSolicitations-SollicitationsduCPM@forces.gc.ca
* Contact Phone: (343) 596-4827

Note: This tender announcement is no longer active. Interested contractors are advised to review the expired tender information for reference purposes only. Deadline for submission of responses has passed. There is no further information on this opportunity.
